name: Web of Deceit: Black Widow
summary: Web of Deceit: Black Widow is a puzzle game where the player must search for hidden objects in scary, horror environments. Follow a trail of clues and dead husbands as you explore this once picturesque town now at the mercy of the Black Widow and her mechanical minions. What drives her lust for revenge? Where is the root of her strange power? Uncover the bizarre history - and mystery - of this little town. And track down the Black Widow in time to foil her devious plot for revenge!
